DOC.criteria: The patient volunteer must give his/her inform sign consent The patient volunteer must insure beneficiary health insurance plan The patient volunteer available 6 month followup For group `` P '' : patient history VTE For group `` T '' : healthy volunteer history VTE history chronic disease history neoplastic disease history chronic infection take anticoagulant , antiplatelet medication acute disease infection last 2 week The patient participate another study The patient exclusion period determine previous study The patient judicial protection , tutorship curatorship The patient refuse sign consent It impossible correctly inform patient The patient pregnant , parturient , breastfeed The patient give birth past three month
